statements: UPDATE election_data SET candidate_name='Alice' WHERE voter_id=100
UPDATE election_data SET voting_district=5, candidate_name='Bob' WHERE voter_id=200
UPDATE election_data SET candidate_name = 'John Doe', vote_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE voter_id = 12345;
UPDATE election_data SET voting_district = 5, vote_timestamp = '2022-10-16 14:45:00', candidate_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE voter_id = 67890;
UPDATE election_voters SET vote_cast = true WHERE voter_id = 101;
UPDATE election_results SET votes_received = 1500, election_round = 2 WHERE result_id = 201;
UPDATE election_voters SET vote_cast = TRUE WHERE voter_id = 123;
UPDATE election_results SET votes_received = votes_received + 1, election_round = 2 WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE election_voters SET age = 30 WHERE voter_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE election_candidates SET political_experience = 2, party_affiliation = 'Independent' WHERE candidate_name = 'Bob';
UPDATE election_voters SET age = 30, occupation = 'Engineer' WHERE voter_id = 1001;
UPDATE election_candidates SET party_affiliation = 'Independent', political_experience = 5 WHERE candidate_id = 2002;
UPDATE voters SET voter_age = 30 WHERE voter_id = 12345;
UPDATE candidates SET candidate_position = 'President' WHERE candidate_id = 54321;
UPDATE voters SET voter_age = 35, voter_location = 'New York' WHERE voter_id = 12345;
UPDATE candidates SET candidate_position = 'Mayor' WHERE candidate_party = 'Democratic';
UPDATE voters SET party_affiliation='Independent' WHERE voter_id=101;
UPDATE votes SET vote_option='Candidate A' WHERE vote_id=201;
UPDATE voters SET age = age + 1, party_affiliation = 'Independent' WHERE voter_id = 1;
UPDATE votes SET vote_option = 'Republican' WHERE voter_id = 2 AND election_id = 1;
